relatedBlades.copy:
IDC Marketscape
CDN Analyst Report

## Cloudflare Named A 'Leader' in the 2022 IDC MarketScape for WW CDN Services __See why Cloudflare is named a LEADER__ in the 2022 IDC MarketScape for Worldwide Commercial Content Delivery Network Services 2022 Vendor Assessment. (doc #US47652821, March 2022. ![Q1'22 IDC CDN chart (new)](//cf-assets.www.cloudflare.com/slt3lc6tev37/4yd2P4OxdTeMGNPdzF5DkP/1b6b2dede2b057911d9c0a5fdda349fd/US47652821tabfig_1__1_.png) Cloudflare highlights: - Highly customizable __Isolate Serverless Architecture__ - __Self Serve Portal and Capabilities__ that include dashboard with both __Content Delivery and Security Analytics__ - Service stack meets requirements for __Zero Trust Service__ and has an __integrated SASE offering__ - Cloudflare's strategic partnership with JD Cloud in China enables __in-country cached content__, with the same performance security and reliability as the rest of the world According to the IDC MarketScape, *"Cloudflare is a highly innovative vendor and continues to invest in its competencies to support advanced technologies such as virtualization, serverless, AI/ML, IoT, HTTP3, 5G and (mobile) edge computing.*"

relatedBlades.htmlContent: Source: IDC MarketScape: Worldwide Commercial Content Delivery Network Services 2022 Vendor Assessment (doc #US47652821, March 2022). IDC MarketScape vendor analysis model is designed to provide an overview of the competitive fitness of ICT suppliers in a given market. The research methodology utilizes a rigorous scoring methodology based on both qualitative and quantitative criteria that results in a single graphical illustration of each vendor's position within a given market. The Capabilities score measures vendor product, go-to-market and business execution in the short-term. The Strategy score measures alignment of vendor strategies with customer requirements in a 3-5-year timeframe. Vendor market share is represented by the size of the icons.
